mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project(pId, pName, pCreateDate, pEndDate, ptype, cId, pModelManagerId, pModelStaff, pRenderManagerId, pRenderStaff, pAfterManagerId, pAfterStaff, pPeriodStatus, pProjectStatus, pFileUrl, pModelWage, pRenderWage, pAfterWage) VALUES (${pId},#{pName},#{pCreateDate},#{pEndDate},${ptype},${cId},${pModelManagerId},#{pModelStaff}, ${pRenderManagerId},#{pRenderStaff},${pAfterManagerId},#{pAfterStaff},${pPeriodStatus},${pProjectStatus}, #{pFileUrl},${pModelWage},${pRenderWage},${pAfterWage})
mapper.select: SELECT pid, pname, pcreatedate, penddate, ptype, cid, pmodelmanagerid, pmodelstaff, prendermanagerid, prenderstaff, paftermanagerid, pafterstaff, pperiodstatus, pprojectstatus, pfileurl, pmodelwage, prenderwage, pafterwage FROM project WHERE pId=${pId}
